# init(layoutSize:elementKind:alignment:)

**Initializer**

Creates a boundary supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, with an alignment relative to a section or layout.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(layoutSize: NSCollectionLayoutSize, elementKind: String, alignment: NSRectAlignment)
```

## Creating a boundary supplementary item

- **init(layoutSize:elementKind:alignment:absoluteOffset:)**: Creates a boundary supplementary item of the specified size and element kind, with an alignment relative to a section or layout at an absolute offset.
